html: #FamiliesNotFacilities Act would: •Prohibit DHS from using information gained from the sponsor placement process to conduct deportation proceedings •Transfer funding from ICE enforcement and removal to the DHS OIG to investigate child separation
text:
#FamiliesNotFacilities Act would:
•Prohibit DHS from using information gained from the sponsor placement process to conduct deportation proceedings
•Transfer funding from ICE enforcement and removal to the DHS OIG to investigate child separation

html: Overall women in the US are paid 80¢ for every $ paid to men- a gap of $10,169/year. The gap is even wider for women of color: Black women earn 61¢ for every dollar paid to white, non-Hispanic men; Native American women 58¢ & Latinas just 53¢ http://www.nationalpartnership.org/our-work/resources/workplace/fair-pay/americas-women-and-the-wage-gap.pdf … #EqualPayDay

html: Parkland. Orlando. In Florida and across the country, gun violence is a public health crisis. I'm cosponsoring #JaimesLaw, in honor of Jaime Guttenberg, b/c we must pass common-sense gun violence reform that can save lives. Closing the #AmmoLoophole is a critical step.
text:
Parkland. Orlando. In Florida and across the country, gun violence is a public health crisis. 

I'm cosponsoring #JaimesLaw, in honor of Jaime Guttenberg, b/c we must pass common-sense gun violence reform that can save lives. Closing the #AmmoLoophole is a critical step.

html: Gun violence is a public health crisis. I am supporting #JaimesLaw, named in honor of Jaime Guttenberg, because it is past time to enact commonsense gun violence reforms that can save lives. html: This hospital in Colombia has seen an influx of Venezuelan patients since 2015. We met with patients and heard their stories, reflecting their personal courage and the tragedy of the humanitarian crisis in Venezuela.
text: This hospital in Colombia has seen an influx of Venezuelan patients since 2015. We met with patients and heard their stories, reflecting their personal courage and the tragedy of the humanitarian crisis in Venezuela.

html: A mother told us about crossing the border to Colombia to give birth to her child because there wasn’t sufficient medical support in Venezuela, and being unable to return home due to border closures. A man told us about losing his eye while attempting to deliver humanitarian aid.pic.twitter.com/qZAOn8Mijz
text: A mother told us about crossing the border to Colombia to give birth to her child because there wasn’t sufficient medical support in Venezuela, and being unable to return home due to border closures. html: One of my top priorities in Congress is to make sure we change our laws to advance justice and equity for women. On #InternationalWomensDay I want to highlight legislation we're already working on, this Congress, to support that goal – and we’re only getting started. #IWD2019

html: Women are vanguards; across all of history, women have changed our country and our world, often while facing inequitable, unjust circumstances - especially women of color, LGBTQ women, disabled women, and other women with multiple marginalized identities. #IWD2019

html: As my family joins millions of others around the world in gathering on Yom Kippur, I wish an easy fast and a meaningful day to all those observing. On this Day of Atonement, let us reflect on the past year and resolve to work in the year ahead to improve ourselves and our nation.
text: As my family joins millions of others around the world in gathering on Yom Kippur, I wish an easy fast and a meaningful day to all those observing. On this Day of Atonement, let us reflect on the past year and resolve to work in the year ahead to improve ourselves and our nation.

html: Across the country, people who are legally prohibited from buying bullets are able to do it anyway because sellers don't have the tools to enforce the law. That's why I introduced the bicameral Ammunition Background Check Act with @SenBlumenthal to close this dangerous loophole.pic.twitter.com/QwD7aotyB3
text: Across the country, people who are legally prohibited from buying bullets are able to do it anyway because sellers don't have the tools to enforce the law. That's why I introduced the bicameral Ammunition Background Check Act with @SenBlumenthal to close this dangerous loophole.pic.twitter.com/QwD7aotyB3

html: That's why I've just introduced the Ammunition Background Check Act to make instant background checks universal and comprehensive for purchases of ammunition. We must keep guns AND bullets out of the wrong hands. #NeverAgain
text: That's why I've just introduced the Ammunition Background Check Act to make instant background checks universal and comprehensive for purchases of ammunition. We must keep guns AND bullets out of the wrong hands. #NeverAgain

html: Under current law, the same people who are prohibited from purchasing a gun are also prohibited from purchasing ammunition. Unlike guns, however, federal law does not require a background check to prevent the illegal purchase of bullets.
text: Under current law, the same people who are prohibited from purchasing a gun are also prohibited from purchasing ammunition. Unlike guns, however, federal law does not require a background check to prevent the illegal purchase of bullets.
